projects.name: Buybuy store
projects.text: This is a website that calls a REST API which returns data about the countries of the world. I built this site with Typescript, SASS and I used Axios to handle the API calls. It is a Frontend Mentor challenge

projects.name: Where in the World
projects.text: This is a website that calls a REST API which returns data about the countries of the world. I built this site with Typescript, SASS and I used Axios to handle the API calls. It is a Frontend Mentor challenge

projects.name: interactive comment section
projects.text: This is an interactive comment section. It is responsive, accessible and makes use of local storage. I created this site with  React and SASS. It is a Frontend Mentor challenge

projects.name: ip address tracker
projects.text: This is a Frontend Mentor challlenge where I worked with an API. It was created with React and CSS.

projects.name: My portfolio
projects.text: This is my portfolio that I designed, you are already previewing the live site. It was created with React, SASS and Bootstrap.
